item.description: Shuhei A. Horiguchi, Tetsuya J. Kobayashi. Optimal control of stochastic reaction networks with entropic control cost and emergence of mode-switching strategies. preprint arXiv:2409.17488 https://arxiv.org/abs/2409.17488
